'''About me:'''

I Love GNOME!
I help with maintaining the Macedonian (македонски) translation of GNOMEs UI and documentation. I've been coordinating the <nowiki>[<nowiki>[[http://progress.gnome.org/languages/mk/|Macedonian translation team]]</nowiki></nowiki>] for 5 years.
Trying to help by reporting bugs, small patches, mentoring students that want to translate GNOME as a part of GHOP etc.

I'm also using Ubuntu and contributing with translations. I started the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-mk|Macedonian Localization Team]]</nowiki> at Launchpad. The team is now led by <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/JoveNaumovski2|Jovan Naumovski]]</nowiki>.

Currently living and working in Brno, the Czech Republic.
